IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100009Chat Backup IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100010Chat Backup IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100011* You can restore your backed up data only when you register your desktop device. Go to Settings > General and deregister your desktop device to re-register and restore your data.
* You can restore your data within 14 days of the backup. The data will be permanently deleted after 14 days of the backup.
* Only text messages will be backed up. Note that the following data will not be backed up: - Photos, videos and text messages over 1,000 characters - Text messages in secret chats and open chats IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100012[Expired] IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100013Backup Info IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100014Last Backup IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100015Expiry Date IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100016Total Size IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100017Delete IDS_ADVANCEDSETTING_100018There is not enough space available. IDS_CHAT_100068You are unable to view messages for this period as you did not log in to KakaoTalk Desktop for 3 days. IDS_CHAT_100069Why can’t I check my messages from 3 days ago? IDS_CHAT_100070KakaoTalk temporarily stores messages on the server for users who cannot check the messages immediately. These messages will be stored on the server for 2-3 days and will then be deleted permanently from the server for your privacy. Therefore, if you do not log in to KakaoTalk Desktop for more than 3 days, you may not be able to check the messages you’ve received during that period. IDS_CHAT_100071What if I can’t log in to KakaoTalk Desktop frequently? IDS_CHAT_100072If you have not used KakaoTalk on your desktop frequently but you have been using KakaoTalk on your mobile, the messages you have missed will remain on your mobile.
